title: Sucktown, Alaska
description: Freshman year, Eddie Ashford had it all. Friends, parties, Taco Bell. He enjoyed it, reveled in it even. And he flunked out.Now he wants to redeem himself. Has to. He takes a job in tiny Kusko, Alaska, and promises to stay a year. His intentions are pure, but soon heâ€™s lonely, low on cash, and desperate to escape the tundra.
author: Craig Dirkes
